sentence.text: The results showed that the concentration of inflammatory cytokines [interleukin 1β (IL1β) and tumor necrosis factor α (Tperipheral nervous system development-α)], myeloperoxidase (low-density lipoprotein particle remodeling) activity in the lung tissue and blood, protein abundance of toll-like receptor 4 (I-kappaB phosphorylation), nuclear factor κB (NF-κB, p65), phosphorylated p65 (p-p65), inhibitor κBα (IκBα), and phosphorylated IκBα (p-IκBα), and relative mRNA expression of genes associated with inflammation, such as TLR4, NF-κB, IL1β, interleukin 6 (IL6), and TNF-α, were significantly upregulated in the cell cycle arrest group compared to the PBS group.
